meanings.definition: A type of red wine made from the Zinfandel grape.
meanings.sent1: I enjoy sipping on zinfandels during dinner.
meanings.sent2: The winery had a special offer on zinfandels this weekend.
meanings.sent3: At the party, everyone wanted a taste of the zinfandels.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of zinfandels filled the room, inviting us to indulge.
meanings.sent5: The zinfandels paired perfectly with the grilled steak.

meanings.definition: Plural form of zinfandel, referring to multiple bottles or glasses of the wine.
meanings.sent1: We bought a few zinfandels to share with friends.
meanings.sent2: The restaurant offered a variety of zinfandels on their menu.
meanings.sent3: The table was filled with empty zinfandels by the end of the night.
meanings.sent4: The shelves were stocked with zinfandels of different vintages.
meanings.sent5: The clinking of zinfandels signaled the start of the celebration.
